insert.if: UPDATE d_newspaper dn SET dn.headline=#{headline}, dn.headline_body=#{headlineBody}, dn.subedition=#{subedition}, dn.important_notice=#{importantNotice}, dn.seat_table=#{seatTable}, dn.update_time=NOW(), dn.status=#{status} WHERE dn.id=#{newspaperId}

INSERT INTO d_newspaper ( game_id, header, headline, headline_body, subedition, important_notice, seat_table, create_time, status ) VALUES( #{gameId}, #{header}, #{headline}, #{headlineBody}, #{subedition}, #{importantNotice}, #{seatTable}, NOW(), #{status} )

mapper.select: SELECT dn.id AS newspaperId, dn.header AS header FROM d_newspaper dn WHERE dn.game_id = #{gameId} ORDER BY dn.id DESC

SELECT dn.id AS newspaperId, dn.header AS header, dn.headline AS headline, dn.headline_body AS headlineBody, dn.subedition AS subedition, dn.important_notice AS importantNotice, dn.seat_table AS seatTable FROM d_newspaper dn WHERE dn.id = #{newspaperId}
